constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 36 (Monday, February 28, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. DIAZ-BALART:
H.R. 6867.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the United States Constitution
[Page H1176]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

title: To designate the area between the intersections of 16th Street, Northwest and Fuller Street, Northwest and 16th Street, Northwest and Euclid Street, Northwest in Washington, District of Columbia, as "Oswaldo Payá Way".
